description: This interface defines an ISO15118 DC Charger

MISSING_set_evse_energy_to_be_delivered.description: Optional: Amount of energy to be delivered by the EVSE.

set_evse_peak_current_ripple.description: Peak-to-peak magnitude of the current ripple of the EVSE

MISSING_set_evse_current_regulation_tole.description: Optional: Sets the absolute magnitude of the current regulation tolerance of the EVSE

set_evse_minimum_voltage_limit.description: Sets the minimum voltage the EVSE can deliver with the expected accuracy

set_evse_minimum_current_limit.description: Sets the minimum current the EVSE can deliver with the expected accuracy.

set_evse_maximum_voltage_limit.description: Optional: Sets the maximum voltage the EVSE can deliver.

set_evse_maximum_current_limit.description: Optional: Sets the maximum current the EVSE can deliver.

set_evse_maximum_power_limit.description: Optional: Sets the maximum power the EVSE can deliver.

set_evse_current_limit_achieved.description: Sets the EVSECurrentLimitAchieved flag that indicates whether the EVSE has reached its current limit.

current_limit_achieved.description: True, if the EVSE has reached its current limit, false otherwise

set_evse_voltage_limit_achieved.description: Sets the EVSEVoltageLimitAchieved flag that indicates whether the EVSE has reached its voltage limit.

voltage_limit_achieved.description: True, if the EVSE has reached its voltage limit, false otherwise

set_evse_power_limit_achieved.description: Sets the EVSEPowerLimitAchieved flag that indicates whether the EVSE has reached its power limit.

power_limit_achieved.description: True, if the EVSE has reached its power limit, false otherwise

set_evse_present_voltage.description: Sets the output voltage of the EVSE.

set_evse_present_current.description: Sets the output current of the EVSE

ev_target_voltage.description: Target voltage (unit: V) requested by the EV

ev_target_current.description: Instantaneous current (unit: A) requested by the EV

ev_energy_capacity.description: Optional: Energy capacity (unit: Wh) of the EV

ev_energy_request.description: Optional: Amount of energy (unit: Wh) the EV requests from the EVSE

MISSING_bulk_charging_complete.description: If set to true, the EV indicates that bulk charge (approx. 80% SOC) is complete.

MISSING_charging_complete.description: If set to true, the EV indicates that full charge (100% SOC)is complete.

remaining_time_to_full_soc.description: Optional: Estimated or calculated time (unit: s) until full charge (100% SOC) is complete.

remaining_time_to_bulk_soc.description: Optional: Estimated or calculated time (unit: s) until bulk charge (80% SOC) is complete.

MISSING_ev_soc.description: State of charge (soc) of the EV's battery.

MISSING_ev_ready_for_charging.description: If set to TRUE, the EV is ready to charge.
